attributes.additional_details:
I pay for a tv license i pay £75.00 per month for sky tv and internet this does not include sky sports,not an issue,but when it comes to watching fellow english men and women playing sport it is my veiw that this should be able to veiwable with in our tv license how can we surport England when we cant watch them with out making SKY richer. Eg 6/8/11 Rugby England v Wales cant watch it with out subscibing to sky sports,David Hayes recent fight cant watch it with out paying sky pay per veiw the list goes on and on.
The last thing i have to say
LETS WATCH ENGLAND.
